actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committees.committee: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act with respect to transparency and reporting regarding over-the-counter drug monograph activities, and for other purposes.
